TopicTitle: Career contract to put satellite in Mun orbit doesn't show the orbit.

Articles.Content:
So far I have done contracts to put satellites around Kerbin and they all showed an illustration of what the orbit should look like. However I have one now for an orbit around the Mun but it doesn't show on the map. Am I missing something or do I have to work it out by the figures provided in the contract?

Edited May 10, 2015 by Falesh
Restarting didn't work but I just found out what the issue was. I needed to be in the Mun's sphere of influence for the orbit to show.
select the mun as focus then it probably will show up
